Name: Keyboard Warrior
About the game: Keyboard Warrior is a top-down view shooting adventure game. On your way to your destination, there are many enemies that will stop you, you can try to avoid them, or defeat them in the same way they attack, there are no bullets, instead there are letters,but they have Added the ability to deal damage as the bullets. You need to be careful to avoid these damages, then try to defeat your enemies. There are 9 levels in the game, and the total time is about 2 hours. The style of the game is bright and relaxed, the elements of violence are downplayed, and the fighting atmosphere is rather funny. The inspiration of the game comes from the ubiquitous keyboard warriors on the Internet. They will attack others with words on the Internet for no reason, just like in the game they will launch letter-shaped bullets at you for no reason to attack you, the game The characters are all sitting on chairs, just like sitting in front of a computer typing in reality world. Words can't make you bleed, but they can cause harm. The developers hope that through this game, we call on everyone not to be affected by keyboard warriors on the Internet in their daily lives. In addition, they also hope that everyone will not become that annoying keyboard warrior.
